thread.section_title: The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic Service & Amazing Architecture
thread.title_full: Fantastic Service & Amazing Architecture - Review of The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: John P
title: Fantastic Service & Amazing Architecture
text:
The Beekman is an amazing jewel located in the up and coming downtown market. With a stunning 10 story atrium and richly appointed rooms, it is truly one of a kind and a must stay for any traveler. The staff is warm, friendly and helpful - they even call you after you check-in to make sure all is perfect. Every detail was thought about and all my needs looked after.
Room Tip: Ask for an atrium room - it's close to the elevators. See more room tips
